t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    m = [a[i] for i in range(len(a)) if a[i] == i + 1]
    v = []
    w = []
    for i in set(a):
        if i not in m:
            v.append(a.count(i))
            w.append(i)
    b = dict(zip(w, v))
    c = 0
    for i in range(len(b)):
        if b[w[i]] >= k:
            c += 1
    print(c)

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    (N, K) = map(int, input().split())
    A = list(map(int, input().split()))
    j = 1
    max1 = 0
    temp = dict()
    for i in range(1, N + 1):
        temp[i] = A.count(i)
    for i in temp.values():
        if i >= K and j != A[j - 1]:
            max1 += 1
        j += 1
    print(max1)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = tuple(map(int, input().split()))
    (d, count, j) = ({i: arr.count(i) for i in range(1, n + 1)}, 0, 1)
    for x in d.values():
        if x >= k and arr[j - 1] != j:
            count += 1
        j += 1
    print(count)
    t -= 1
